mockit.integration.junit3
Class JUnitTestCaseDecorator

java.lang.Object
  mockit.integration.TestRunnerDecorator
      mockit.integration.junit3.JUnitTestCaseDecorator

@MockClass(realClass=junit.framework.TestCase.class)
public final class JUnitTestCaseDecorator
extends TestRunnerDecorator

Provides an startup mock that modifies the JUnit 3.8 test runner so that it calls back to JMockit for each test execution. When that happens, JMockit will assert any expectations set during the test, including expectations specified through Mock as well as in Expectations subclasses.

This class is not supposed to be accessed from user code. JMockit will automatically load it at startup.
